languages.text: "Я не смею ни в чем обвинять вас, Ваша Светлость. Я лишь беспокоюсь. Если вы опровергнете мои тревоги — дом Зауэрбэк будет молиться за вас каждый день".

traits.locale_text: "Я не смею ни в чем обвинять вас, Ваша милость. Я лишь беспокоюсь. Если вы опровергнете мои тревоги — дом Зауэрбек будет молиться за вас каждый день".

languages.text: "I wouldn't dare accuse you of anything, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am simply concerned. If you happen to lay my concerns to rest, House Sauerback will be praying for your well-being every day."
languages.original_text: "Я не смею ни в чем обвинять вас, Ваша Светлость. Я лишь беспокоюсь. Если вы опровергнете мои тревоги — дом Зауэрбэк будет молиться за вас каждый день".

traits.locale_text: "I wouldn't dare accuse you of anything, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am simply concerned. If you happen to lay my concerns to rest, House Sauerback will be praying for your wellbeing every day."
"I wouldn't dare accuse you of anything, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am simply concerned. If you happen to lay my concerns to rest, House Sauerback will be praying for your wellbeing every day."
"I wouldn't dare accuse you of anything, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am simply concerned. If you happen to lay my concerns to rest, House Sauerback will be praying for your wellbeing every day."
"I wouldn't dare accuse you of anything, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am simply concerned. If you happen to lay my concerns to rest, House Sauerback will be praying for your wellbeing every day."
"I wouldn't dare accuse you of anything, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am simply concerned. If you happen to lay my concerns to rest, House Sauerback will be praying for your well-being every day."

languages.text: 「非難の意図はございません、陛下。私はただ、懸念しているのです。この心配を取り除いていただけるならば、ザウアーバック家は陛下の幸福のために日々祈りましょう」
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't dare accuse you of anything, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am simply concerned. If you happen to lay my concerns to rest, House Sauerback will be praying for your well-being every day."

traits.locale_text: 「非難の意図はございません、陛下。私はただ、懸念しているのです。この心配を取り除いていただけるならば、ザウアーバック家は陛下の幸福のために日々祈りましょう」

languages.text: “我不敢指责您什么，大人，我仅仅是担心而已。如果您能消除我的顾虑，那苏尔贝克家族愿意每天为您的福祉祈祷。”
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't dare accuse you of anything, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am simply concerned. If you happen to lay my concerns to rest, House Sauerback will be praying for your well-being every day."

traits.locale_text: “我不敢指责您什么，大人，我仅仅是担心而已。如果您能消除我的顾虑，那苏尔贝克家族愿意每天为您的福祉祈祷。”

languages.text: «Jamás le acusaría de nada, {mf|milord|milady}. Simplemente tengo mis dudas. Si está {mf|dispuesto|dispuesta} a callármelas, la casa Sauerback rezará por su bienestar cada día».
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't dare accuse you of anything, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am simply concerned. If you happen to lay my concerns to rest, House Sauerback will be praying for your well-being every day."

traits.locale_text: «Jamás le acusaría de nada, {mf|milord|milady}. Simplemente tengo mis dudas. Si está {mf|dispuesto|dispuesta} a callármelas, la casa Sauerback rezará por su bienestar cada día».

languages.text: « Jamais je ne vous accuserais de quoi que ce soit, Votre Seigneurie. Je vous signifiais simplement mon inquiétude. Une fois mes préoccupations apaisées, la maison Sauerback se fera un plaisir de prier chaque jour pour votre bien-être. »
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't dare accuse you of anything, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am simply concerned. If you happen to lay my concerns to rest, House Sauerback will be praying for your well-being every day."

traits.locale_text: « Jamais je ne vous accuserais de quoi que ce soit, Votre Seigneurie. Je vous signifiais simplement mon inquiétude. Une fois mes préoccupations apaisées, la maison Sauerback se fera un plaisir de prier chaque jour pour votre bien-être. »

languages.text: "Ich würde es nicht wagen, Euch zu beschuldigen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich bin lediglich besorgt. Falls Ihr meine Sorge beruhigen könnt, wird das Haus Sauerback jeden Tag für Euer Wohlbefinden beten."
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't dare accuse you of anything, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am simply concerned. If you happen to lay my concerns to rest, House Sauerback will be praying for your well-being every day."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde es nicht wagen, Euch zu beschuldigen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich bin lediglich besorgt. Falls Ihr meine Sorge beruhigen könnt, wird das Haus Sauerback jeden Tag für Euer Wohlbefinden beten."

languages.text: "Haşa, sizi hiçbir suçla itham etmeye cüret edemem {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Sadece endişeliyim. Eğer endişelerimi giderirseniz Sauerback Hanesi, her gün sağlığınıza duacı olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't dare accuse you of anything, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am simply concerned. If you happen to lay my concerns to rest, House Sauerback will be praying for your well-being every day."

traits.locale_text: "Haşa, sizi hiçbir suçla itham etmeye cüret bile edemem {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Sadece endişeliyim. Eğer endişelerimi giderirseniz, Sauerback Hanesi her gün sağlığınız için dua edecektir."
